title: Definition of direct joint variation
text: In a direct relationship, variables are directly proportional. This means that as $$x$$, w, or $$z$$ increases, $$y$$ increases, and vice versa.

title: General form
text: If "y varies jointly with $$x$$, w, and z," then the general form of our relationship will be $$y=kxwz$$.

title: Solving for k.
text: Substitute $$x=1$$, $$z=2$$, and $$w=5$$ and $$y=100$$ into our relationship $$y$$ $$=$$ kxwz to solve for k. What do you get?

title: Put it all together
text: Now all you have to do is substitute k into the general form to get your equation!
